meanings.definition: An extraordinary or unusual thing, person, or event.
meanings.sent1: The circus was a lollapaloozas of colors and performances.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display was a real lollapaloozas last night.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot at the party was the lollapaloozas of the evening.
meanings.sent4: Her new invention was a lollapaloozas in the world of technology.
meanings.sent5: The treasure hunt turned out to be a lollapaloozas of surprises.

meanings.definition: A large or impressive thing or event.
meanings.sent1: The mansion was a lollapaloozas of a house with its grandeur.

meanings.sent3: The cake at the party was a lollapaloozas in size and decoration.

meanings.sent5: The waterfall was a lollapaloozas of nature's beauty.

meanings.definition: A remarkable or outstanding example of a particular kind.
meanings.sent1: The painting was a lollapaloozas of abstract art.

meanings.sent3: The giant pumpkin at the fair was a lollapaloozas among the other entries.
